title: Which laptop brand is best under 30000? - Quora

response.answer_text: Best Laptops Under 30000 in India 2018 TOP 5 Laptops .Don’t miss it.Updated 11/NOVEMBER/2018 If you are buying a laptop today, chances are your budget is limited to 30000. In this budget you can’t really expect top class performance, but you can still get a usable day-to-day laptop, which are the best laptops under 30000? Well, we are here to help and this is our list of the best laptops under 30K. These laptops offer a good combination of design, build quality, performance and display. While you can get better laptops for more, these is the current list of the top laptops under 30000.  1.Lenovo Ideapad 320E (80XL0414IN) Brief Description Lenovo Ideapad 320E (80XL0414IN) is a stylish and powerful Notebook Laptop and is powered by Intel Core i5 (7th Gen) processor clocked at a speed of 3.10 GHz and sports a 15.6 inchOn the memory front, the laptop is equipped with a hard drive of 2 TB and a 8 DDR4 RAM,thereby making it possible to store ample amount of data.All the above features ensure that you breeze through all your tasks throughout the Buoni pasto DAY | buono pasto, buono regalo e welfare aziendale is backed up by a Li-ion battery that keeps the device running for upto up to 6 hours or a considerable amount of Ora Esatta e Fusi Orari is loaded with Dual and Dolby Audio for a great audio experience RS. 24390 GO FOR THIS ITS BEST ONEAsus X541UA SpecificationBASIC INFORMATION model name :Asus X541UA operating system (with version) :DOS DISPLAY display size (in inches) :15.6 CONNECTIVITY wireless connectivity:Yes MEMORY ram included (in gb) :4 ram type:DDR4 PHYSICAL SPECIFICATIONS laptop weight (in kgs) :1.9 PROCESSOR processor model name :Intel Core i3 (7th Gen) clock speed :2.4 GHz graphics processor :Intel HD STORAGE hard drive type :SATA hard drive capacity :1 TB optical drive :DVD-Writer POWER battery backup (in hours) :3 battery type :Lithium Li-ion SOUND sound technology :SonicMaster audio speakers :Dual WARRANTY AND MANUFACTURER INFO warranty length :1 Year 2.Asus X541UA According to to us the best laptop under 30000 is the Asus Vivobook X541UA. The laptop is powerful and can handle most day-to-day tasks, thanks to the 7th gen Intel Core i3 processor. There is 4GB of RAM and 1TB HDD storage on the laptop, but you don't get a OS pre-installed.  Asus X541UA Brief Description Asus X541UA is a stylish and powerful and is powered by Intel Core i3 (7th Gen) processor clocked at a speed of 2.4 GHz and sports a 15.6 inchOn the memory front, the laptop is equipped with a hard drive of 1 TB and a 4 DDR4 RAM,thereby making it possible to store ample amount of data.All the above features ensure that you breeze through all your tasks throughout the Buoni pasto DAY | buono pasto, buono regalo e welfare aziendale is backed up by a Lithium Li-ion battery that keeps the device running for upto 3 hours or a considerable amount of Ora Esatta e Fusi Orari is loaded with Dual and SonicMaster audio for a great audio experience . Priced just below 20K, the Aspire 3 is not really a performer in any way, but is powerful enough to handle all day-to-day tasks with ease  Acer Aspire 3 Brief Description Acer Aspire 3 is a stylish and powerful and is powered by Dual core clocked at a speed of 1.1 GHz and sports a 15.6 inch HD LED Backlit TFT that comes with a resolution of 1366 x 768 pixels,so the picture quality is crisp and detailed.The screen size is big enough for an enriching gaming, surfing and video watching experience.On the memory front, the laptop is equipped with a hard drive of 500 and a 2 DDR3 RAM,thereby making it possible to store ample amount of data.All the above features ensure that you breeze through all your tasks throughout the day.The connectivity options available on the device are Yes,Bluetooth, Wireless LAN. Dell Vostro 3468 The Dell 3468 is a 14-incher that comes with a 7th-gen Intel Core i3 CPU, 4GB of RAM, and a 1TB hard drive. It runs Ubuntu 14.04 out-of-the-box. If Windows is not a requirement for you, this laptop should be comfortable running the popular Linux distro for light usage.
